attributes.action:
Dear Govenrment.
I want you to change the educational curriculum
attributes.additional_details: Why I want this you may ask well...I want students to enjoy life and not suffer in it.Do you think adding more stress will make our lives better and by making us remember facts that will make us "intelligent". grades only make parents stressed and angrier because they think your dumb and for teachers to just rush through the curriculum and always say" you dont need to understand it just remember it" so please relieve us from this pain and depression cause i dont want another friend to call me and say that they hate their life.So I know you guys are I intelligent and smart so just help us be in 2020 and not 1910.I have so many ideas from  student to adults that I want to say that I cant even fit everything here.So help me to be able to stand in front of you and give you the future.
attributes.background: English should be about formalities and persuasions.Maths about Bills and financial choices,Science about health and puberty,And exams should be banded because they only test your memory.Driving lessons should be added.Homework non existent.Our curriculum needs to be changed completely.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like to change about the National Curriculum
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
